name: Ticking Minute
description:
Ticking Minute

Ticking Minute is a bullet hell game where every minute, your enemies double in number, it is currently still in development and it will become much bigger and more complex.

This game is also being used as a submission for the 6th Brackeys Game Jam.

Upcoming Features (WIP Features)

Weapons! - You will be able to kill your enemies.
